title: Ep. 66: "The Throw," Atlanta's Offense, the Pats' Tactics, and another Andy Reid moment
description:
The Ringer's Robert Mays and Kevin Clark discuss the epic Packers-Cowboys showdown (01:34), "The Throw" (10:34), the Falcons' win (15:57), and the future of the Seahawks (20:18). Then, they cover New England's victory over the Texans (27:30), the Chiefs' loss to the Steelers (37:45), and Andy Reid's legacy (40:53).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
